mapper.sql:
where state != 'DELETE'
AND
( svcnm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR areanm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR placenm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
svcnm LIKE concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
areanm LIKE concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
placenm LIKE concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.select: select distinct slot_date from reservation_slot where svcid = #{svcid} AND slot_date >= CURDATE() AND slot_date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (6 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY) order by slot_date
mapper.update: update stadium set SVCNM = #{SVCNM}, PLACENM = #{PLACENM}, TELNO = #{TELNO}, V_MIN = #{V_MIN}, V_MAX = #{V_MAX}, NOTICE = #{NOTICE}, ADRES = #{ADRES} where SVCID = #{SVCID}
mapper.insert: insert into STADIUM ( SVCID, SVCNM, PLACENM, X, Y, IMG_PATH, TELNO, v_min, v_max, notice, SUBPLACENM, ORGNM, SVCENDTELNO, AREANM, ADRES, DTLCONT ) values ( #{SVCID}, #{SVCNM}, #{PLACENM}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{IMG_PATH}, #{TELNO}, #{V_MIN}, #{V_MAX}, #{NOTICE}, #{SUBPLACENM}, #{ORGNM}, #{SVCENDTELNO}, #{AREANM}, #{ADRES}, #{DTLCONT} )

insert into STADIUM_PATCH ( SVCID, SVCNM, PLACENM, X, Y, IMG_PATH, TELNO, v_min, v_max, notice, SUBPLACENM, ORGNM, SVCENDTELNO, AREANM, ADRES, DTLCONT ) values ( #{SVCID}, #{SVCNM}, #{PLACENM}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{IMG_PATH}, #{TELNO}, #{V_MIN}, #{V_MAX}, #{NOTICE}, #{SUBPLACENM}, #{ORGNM}, #{SVCENDTELNO}, #{AREANM}, #{ADRES}, #{DTLCONT} )
